summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6197 for the improvement of North 128th Street from 1st Ave. Northeast to Fremont Ave.; and certain other streets, avenues, alleys and easements; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 88029, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
